English:
He's still "recharging."
I'm thinking I'll eat him once he's charged.
Chinese:
那傢伙還在“充電”中。
我打算等它充滿電之後吃了它……所以正在等呢。
Korean:
녀석이라면, 아직 "충전"중이야
100%가 되면 먹어 주려고… 기다리던 참이지
German:
Er „erholt“ sich noch.
Ich denke, ich fresse ihn, sobald er erholt ist.

English:
The truth is...
I was waiting for you, [p].
Chinese:
其實……
我是在等你來喔……[p]。
Korean:
사실은…
네가 오는 걸 기다리고 있었어… [p]
German:
In Wahrheit habe ich ...
auf dich gewartet, [p].

English:
Do you remember? Way back when?
It's okay to laugh. I was such a dork.
Chinese:
你想起來了吧？那個時候的事情。
很好笑吧……我超遜的呀。
Korean:
기억해냈잖아? 그때의 일
웃기지… 나, 엄청 꼴사나웠어
German:
Weißt du noch? Damals?
Lach ruhig. Ich war ein Volltrottel.

English:
I said I would protect you all.
But actually, I was just scared.
Chinese:
說什麼要保護你們……
其實只能怕得發抖……
Korean:
너희들을 지키겠다면서 말이야…
사실은 그저, 겁먹은 거였어…
German:
Ich habe gesagt, ich beschütze euch.
Aber eigentlich hatte ich bloß Angst.

English: I was scared, and I... I left him behind.
Chinese: 我好害怕……於是對那傢伙……見死不救。
German:
Ich hatte Angst und ich ...
Habe ihn zurückgelassen.

English:
You tried to help Yuugo back then, didn't you?
Thanks... on behalf of my best friend.
Chinese:
你那時候打算救勇吾吧。
謝謝你啊……為了我的摯友那麼做。
Korean:
너, 그때 유고를 구하려고 했었지
고맙다… 내 친구를 위해서
German:
Du hast damals versucht, Yuugo zu helfen, oder?
Danke ... im Namen meines besten Freundes.

English:
But I'm sorry...
That was supposed to be my job.
Chinese:
不過呀，不好意思，
那是我的任務……
Korean:
하지만 말이야, 미안해
그거, 내 역할이거든…
German:
Aber, es tut mir leid ...
Das hätte meine Aufgabe sein sollen.

English: And it's one I'm finally ready to do.
Chinese: 總算到了完成任務的時候。
Korean: 드디어, 그걸 이룰 수 있는 정도까지 왔어
German: Und endlich bin ich auch bereit dafür.

English:
That's why I've been eating, eating and eating...
I've gained so much power.
Chinese:
我為此不斷地吃、拼命地吃……
終於得到力量。
Korean:
그걸 위해서 먹고, 먹고 전부 먹어 치워서…
난, 힘을 손에 넣은 거야
German:
Deshalb habe ich immer mehr gefressen ...
Ich habe so viel Macht gewonnen.
